preference.name: Mfg0BvrProcess_AffectedChildrenProperties
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of properties on a process object that are affected if children are added or removed.This preference is used for internal purposes only. Do not change the value of this preference. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values, each string must be a valid Teamcenter property.
